summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 5, Laurelhurst Heights Addition, being the alley between 46th Avenue Northeast and 47th Avenue Northeast, from East 38th Street to East 40th Street; by grading and graveling the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8282 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
